item.title: Republicans Led By Chip Roy Move To Repeal The Act Biden Used To Jail Peaceful Pro-Lifers
item.description: GOP Sen. Mike Lee, who has long stood with Roy in calling for the end of the Act, is expected to mirror the move in the upper chamber.

item.title: Democrats Hijack Doug Collins’ Confirmation Hearing To Push Extreme Abortion Agenda
item.description: 'We will be looking at that issue when I get in there to confirm that the VA is actually following the law.'

item.title: Trump Uproots Biden DEI Initiatives From Federal Institutions, Starting With The Coast Guard
item.description: President Donald Trump slashed federal DEI. One of the first house-cleaning measures was firing Coast Guard Adm. Linda Lee Fagan.

item.title: 9 Ways Trump Started Securing The Border On His First Day
item.description: Here are nine actions Trump announced on his first day in office to start addressing the invasion at the southern border.

item.title: Trump Declares ‘Energy Emergency’ To Reverse Biden’s Assault On U.S. Power Production
item.description: At least six out of dozens of executive actions delivered by the newly inaugurated president on Monday focused on energy or environment.
